data.name: Aquaculture Land
data.detailed_description:
Aquaculture Land is an aquafarming simulation game.
In this game, you will act as a businessman that runs a freshwater fish farm. You will manage all things related to fisheries, grow your fish, produce some high-quality fish, and fulfill the needs of your customer to get benefits for your business.

Key Features:


    Pond-Based Fish Environment with Useful Equipment
Build your own pond for your fish farming. Manage your pond to keep the quality of your fish farming with various types of equipment that will help you keep the water quality, control the dissolved oxygen, density, and many other indicators.

    Diverse Types of Commodities with Each of Its Unique Characteristics
Breed many types of fish, crustaceans, and mollusks with each of its unique characteristics to create a diversity in your farm.

    Business Time
Manage your resources efficiently and produce high-quality fish, crustaceans and mollusks to keep your business running!

data.short_description: Aquaculture Land is an aquafarming simulation game. In this game, you will act as a businessman that runs a freshwater fish farm. You will manage all things related to fisheries, grow your fish, produce some high-quality fish, and fulfill the needs of your customer to get benefits for your business.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows® 7/8/10, 32-bit
  • Processor: Intel i3 550 or AMD Phenom II X4
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0 compliant with 512MB of video RAM.
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows® 7/8/10, 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel i7
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0 compliant with 1.0GB of video RAM.
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
